PolicyName: We should increase the top rate of income tax applying to income over 150 000 per year
An adoption of a new global standard on automatic exchange of tax information is needed in order to reduce tax avoidance
We should extend the clawback of bank bonuses in cases of inappropriate behaviour
We should Ban MPs Holding Paid Directorships and Consultancies
Those On Jobseeker's Allowance Must be offered and Take Up a Job after a period of time or Lose Their Benefits
There should be a more extensive set of conditions met prior to consent for Fracking being given
Health and safety at work should be made the general duty of self-employed persons
Failing to report harm to a child should be an offence
Cigarretes should all have the same packaging
Child abduction warning notices and orders should be introduced as well as related provisions including the power of arrest for the breach of such a notice or order
